name: 施陽正
objective: 本課程內容包括﹕熱力學第一定律、熱力學第二定律、結合兩定律之可用能、單相系統、可用能分析、多相系統、動力廠、冷凍、熱力最佳化、不可逆熱力學。
schedule:
1. (1) Course outline, (2) WHAT IS THERMAL SYSTEMS ENGINEERING? & 
    (3) THERMODYNAMICS:INTRODUCTORY CONCEPTS AND DEFINITIONS
2. USING ENERGY AND THE FIRST LAW OF THERMODYNAMICS
3. EVALUATING PROPERTIES (1)
4. EVALUATING PROPERTIES (2)
5. Review of Closed System
6. CONTROL VOLUME ANALYSIS USING ENERGY (Steady-State Steady-Flow) (1)
7. CONTROL VOLUME ANALYSIS USING ENERGY (Steady-State Steady-Flow) (2)
8. CONTROL VOLUME ANALYSIS USING ENERGY (Uniform-State Uniform-Flow)
9. Review of Control Volume
10. Mid-term Exam
11. USING ENTROPY (1)
12. USING ENTROPY (2)
13. VAPOR POWER AND REFRIGERATION SYSTEMS
14. Gas Mixtures
15. PSYCHROMETRIC APPLICATIONS (1)
16. PSYCHROMETRIC APPLICATIONS (2)
17. Review
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
作業及出席率40%
期中考30%
期末考30%
materials: Michael J. Moran, Howard N. Shapiro, Bruce R. Munson, and David P. DeWitt "Introduction to Thermal Systems Engineering:Thermodynamics, Fluid Mechanics, and Heat Transfer", 2003, John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
